Style.att.Color-bind: cast Color let state = self.State in ( not self.VisuallyEnabled ? "#252526" : state == ButtonState::Active ? "#54545C" : state == ButtonState::Pressed ? "#007ACC" : "#3F3F46" )
cast Color let state = self.State in ( not self.VisuallyEnabled ? "#434346" : state == ButtonState::Active ? "#6A6A75" : state == ButtonState::Pressed ? "#1C97EA" : "#54545C" )
cast Color let state = self.State in ( not self.VisuallyEnabled ? "#6D6D6D" : state == ButtonState::Active ? "#F1F1F1" : state == ButtonState::Pressed ? "#FFFFFF" : "#F1F1F1" )
cast Color let state = self.State in ( self.Selected ? "#007ACC" : state == ButtonState::Active ? "#1C97EA" : state == ButtonState::Pressed ? "#1C97EA" : "#434346" )
cast Color let state = self.State in ( state == ButtonState::Active ? "#1C97EA" : state == ButtonState::Pressed ? "#1C97EA" : "#434346" )

SinglelineTextBoxTemplate.att.TextColor: normal:{text:(cast Color "#FFFFFF") background:(cast Color "#00000000")} selectedFocused:{text:(cast Color "#FFFFFF") background:(cast Color "#007ACC")} selectedUnfocused:{text:(cast Color "#FFFFFF") background:(cast Color "#007ACC")}

MultilineTextBoxTemplate.att.TextColor: normal:{text:(cast Color "#FFFFFF") background:(cast Color "#00000000")} selectedFocused:{text:(cast Color "#FFFFFF") background:(cast Color "#007ACC")} selectedUnfocused:{text:(cast Color "#FFFFFF") background:(cast Color "#007ACC")}

PartialView.att.WidthPageSize-bind: let a = self.Position, b = self.TotalSize - self.PageSize in ((cast double a) / (a > b ? a : b))
